meanings.definition: The act of setting a trap to catch mice.
meanings.sent1: My dad placed a mousetrapping in the kitchen to catch the pesky rodents.
meanings.sent2: The mousetrapping in the barn caught three mice last night.
meanings.sent3: The clever mousetrapping outsmarted the sneaky mice in the pantry.
meanings.sent4: The mousetrapping was like a silent sentinel, waiting patiently for its prey.
meanings.sent5: The mousetrapping's sharp mechanism swiftly captured the unsuspecting mouse.

meanings.definition: The practice of using deceptive tactics to keep internet users on a webpage.
meanings.sent1: Some websites engage in mousetrapping to increase their page views.
meanings.sent2: The company was accused of mousetrapping visitors by not allowing them to leave the site easily.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky website resorted to mousetrapping to make visitors stay longer.
meanings.sent4: The mousetrapping technique of endless pop-ups annoyed many users.
meanings.sent5: The clever mousetrapping strategy kept users clicking around the site for hours.
